text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

name: EmailSoortCodelijst_to_ContactInformation_EmailAddressesUse
title: EmailSoortCodelijst to ContactInformation-EmailAddressesUse
description: Maps EmailAddressType codes as found in the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) ContactInformation v1.2 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/ContactInformation-v1.2(2020EN)) to `ContactPoint.use` codes as found in FHIR R4.
